metadata.title: CVE-2020-26555 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Bluetooth legacy BR/EDR PIN code pairing in Bluetooth Core Specification 1.0B through 5.2 may permit an unauthenticated nearby device to spoof the BD_ADDR of the peer device to complete pairing without knowledge of the PIN.
